definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Prophylaxis usage of floxacin could not reduce patient'gastrointestinal infection.
sentences.chinese: 预防性使用氟嗪酸不能减少肠道感染。

sentences.english: Singapore Airlines to change three A380s' engines .
sentences.chinese: 新加坡对三架A380引擎进行预防性更换。

sentences.english: To observe the clinic effects of preventive application of antibiotic in incision of perineum in postpartum.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察产后会阴切口预防性应用抗生素的临床效果。

sentences.english: Prophylactic use of antimicrobial agents could not decrease the incidence of VAP.
sentences.chinese: 预防性使用抗菌药物不能降低VAP的发生率。

sentences.english: Are there preventative measures that can be taken or tests that determine whether a person is at risk for SCDS?
sentences.chinese: 有没有预防性措施或者评估患SCDS风险的检验？

sentences.english: How to develop the preventive and facilitative actions?
sentences.chinese: 如何制定预防性和促进性行动措施？

sentences.english: I made a decision to have a preventive double mastectomy.
sentences.chinese: 我决定进行预防性的双乳切除手术。

sentences.english: Student's psychological well-run vocational crisis in preventive education.
sentences.chinese: 做好民办高职学生心理危机的预防性教育。

sentences.english: Precaution saving theory suggests that uncertainty have a negative effect on consumption.
sentences.chinese: 预防性储蓄理论认为不确定性对居民消费有负效应。

sentences.english: But Pittman says couples can take preventive steps.
sentences.chinese: 而皮特曼医生说，夫妇们可采取一些预防性措施。

sentences.english: Preventive antimicrobial usage can not decrease the morbidity of VAP.
sentences.chinese: 预防性使用抗生素不能降低VAP的发生。

sentences.english: Most companies don't have an emergency succession plan in place, Ballard adds.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是，大部分公司都没有预防性的紧急继任计划。

sentences.english: Notarial system is one of the preventive judicial systems in China.
sentences.chinese: 公证制度是国家设立的一种预防性司法制度。

sentences.english: Provide health prevention measures for staff such as vaccinations.
sentences.chinese: 为雇员提供预防性医疗保健如注射防疫针。

sentences.english: But Pittman says couples can take preventive steps. Here are some pointers and tips
sentences.chinese: 而皮特曼表示，夫妻可以采取一些预防性的措施。

sentences.english: Objective To study on the method for preventive use of antibiotics in selective cesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨选择性剖宫产术预防性应用抗生素的方法。

definition: to prevent/to take precautions against/to protect/to guard against/precautionary/prophylactic
see 防患未然[fang2 huan4 wei4 ran2]
to prevent and cure/prevention and cure
to prevent and control (e.g. the spread of a communicable disease)
